input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

summarystats_input.description: Input TSV file containing summary stats to be processed and corresponding configuration

coloc_input.description: Input TSV containing results from previous finemapping runs to be loaded

coloc_id.description: An ID for the colocalization results, will be used as prefix in colocalization outputs

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

run_liftover.description: Set to true to liftover coordinates to GRCh38

skip_dentist.description: Perform DENTIST cleanup before finemapping. Usually not needed

large_locus_size.description: Maximum size for a locus to enter finemapping and colocalization analysis

run_colocalization.description: Set to true to run colocalization after finemapping

coloc_batch_size.description: Number of loci to be colocalized per batch

pph3_threshold.description: The PP.H3 ABF threshold value to save results into a separate H3 table

pph4_threshold.description: The PP.H4 ABF threshold value to save results into a separate H4 table

publish_dir_mode.description: Define the publish mode for result files generated by the pipeline

is_test_profile.description: Set to true when running test profile
